posts.post_title: Abby's for sale - All Brown Sleeves
posts.post_content:
Hey Benjamin,

I have a few Abby dupes for sale.  Add $3 for shipping.

SGC 10 Piedmont 350 (pin holes) - $25
SGC 10 EPDG - $37
Raw Piedmont 150 (miscut back, may be trimmed?) - $20
SGC A 1909 Sov 150 - $23

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=151587&d=1404684123[/IMG]

thanks!

Cliff
out of curiosity why can't I see some of the scans and just see the path name?

Decided to take a run at the Monster. Making this a long term project and would prefer to collect them alphabetically A to Z. 
Like I mentioned above. Prefer Poor to Very Good range, no beaters. Graded or ungraded. Common backs to keep cost down. I like the freaks also. 
Listed below are the "A" guys I'm currently hunting for.  I have a Dolly Gray EPDG card for sale or trade if anyone is interested. 
Thanks for your help. Some pretty cool guys on these boards. Been a lot of fun. 

Ed Abbaticchio (Blue Sleeves)
Bill Abstein
Doc Adkins 
Red Ames (Hands At Chest)
Red Ames (Hands Above Head)
John Anderson
Frank Arellanes
Harry Arndt
Jake Atz
